import React from 'react'; import { Link, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from "unistore/react"; import { actions } from "../store/store"; const ProfilInfo = (props) => { return(
Profil
Nama Lengkap

Alamat

Telepon

Email

Tanggal Lahir

: {props.nama}

: {props.alamat}

: {props.telepon}

: {props.email}

: {props.tanggalLahir}

Ubah Profil
) } export default connect('nama, alamat, telepon, email, tanggalLahir', actions)(withRouter(ProfilInfo))
